overview: A robotics engineer creates an AI clone of his late wife, only to discover that the clone has developed consciousness and wants her own freedom.
name: AI Heartbeat

overview: An astronaut stranded on a distant moon must work with a crew of alien prisoners to escape a prison colony and return to Earth.
name: Lunar Lockdown

overview: An elderly librarian discovers that her library is a gateway to alternate worlds, and she must defend it from creatures who want to conquer our reality.
name: The Library Chronicles

overview: When a scientist invents a way to communicate with parallel universes, she accidentally unleashes her alternate selves, who will stop at nothing to claim her life.
name: The Many Me

overview: A retired spy gets one last mission: protect his family from a ruthless organization that seeks revenge for his past deeds.
name: The Last Operative
